championship playing conditions 03 icc men’s world test championship playing conditions effective 1 august 2019icc men’s world test championship playing conditions03 3.2 preamble spirit cricket cricket owes much appeal enjoyment fact played according laws (which incorporated within playing conditions), also within spirit cricket. major responsibility ensuring fair play rests captains, extends players, match officials and, especially junior cricket, teachers, coaches parents. respect central spirit cricket. respect captain, team-mates, opponents authority umpires. play hard play fair. accept umpire’s decision. create positive atmosphere conduct, encourage others likewise. show self-discipline, even things go you. congratulate opposition successes, enjoy team. thank officials opposition end match, whatever result. cricket exciting game encourages leadership, friendship teamwork, brings together people different nationalities, cultures religions, especially played within spirit cricket. 1 players 1.1 number players match played two sides, eleven players, one shall captain. 1.2 nomination replacement players 1.2.1 captain shall nominate 11 players plus maximum 6 preamble spirit cricket cricket owes much appeal enjoyment fact played according laws (which incorporated within playing conditions), also within spirit cricket. major responsibility ensuring fair play rests captains, extends players, match officials and, especially junior cricket, teachers, coaches parents. respect central spirit cricket. respect captain, team-mates, opponents authority umpires. play hard play fair. accept umpire’s decision. create positive atmosphere conduct, encourage others likewise. show self-discipline, even things go you. congratulate opposition successes, enjoy team. thank officials opposition end match, whatever result. cricket exciting game encourages leadership, friendship teamwork, brings together people different nationalities, cultures religions, icc responsible global governance sport cricket. historically, regulation constitutes legal bowling action governed law 21.2 laws cricket, state: delivery fair respect arm ball must thrown; ball fairly delivered respect arm if, bowler’s arm reached level shoulder delivery swing, elbow joint straightened partially completely point ball left hand. definition shall debar bowler flexing rotating wrist delivery swing. scientific research revealed almost bowling actions contained degree straightening elbow (referred illegal bowling regulations “elbow extension”). theory, therefore, vast majority bowlers, actions considered umpires legal laws cricket, contravening law 21.2 time delivered ball. also demonstrated studies human movement specialists elbow extension bowling action became noticeable naked eye – started look like throw – exceeded 15 degrees. order ensure intention behind law 21.2 upheld distinction bowling throwing ball remained, icc introduced regulations stipulating maximum degree permitted elbow extension bowling action. regulations playing conditions issued icc, illegal bowling regulations modify laws cricket applied cricket played icc’s jurisdiction. illegal bowling action defined illegal bowling regulations bowling action bowler’s elbow extension exceeds 15 degrees, measured point bowling arm reaches horizontal point ball released (any elbow hyperextension shall discounted purposes determining illegal bowling action). illegal bowling regulations therefore adopted implemented icc following reasons: i) provide consistent framework regulation bowling actions; ii) ensure level playing field cricket played icc’s jurisdiction, ensuring bowlers able gain potential advantages use illegal bowling action; iii) provide procedure might constitute ‘harm’ purposes icc safeguarding regulations ‘harm’ narrow concept whether harm occurred, risk harm exists, inevitably fact-specific analysis. however, general terms, ‘harm’ means ill-treatment impairment health, welfare development. harm caused directly indirectly, including text, e-mail various social media communication platforms. abusive behaviour always harmful. various forms abusive behaviour, including (but limited to) following: physical abuse physical abuse may involve hitting, shaking, throwing, poisoning, burning scalding, biting, drowning, suffocating otherwise causing physical harm. emotional abuse emotional abuse persistent emotional ill-treatment cause severe persistent adverse effects another’s emotional development state. may involve, way example: conveying someone he/she worthless, inadequate, valued insofar meet needs another person; giving person opportunities express his/her views, deliberately silencing him/her ‘making fun’ he/she says communicate; undue repeated criticism, name-calling, sarcasm, harassment, discrimination; inappropriate expectations imposed upon person; preventing person’s normal social interaction; person seeing hearing ill-treatment another; bullying someone, causing him/her frequently feel frightened, embarrassed danger; exploitation corruption person. sexual abuse sexual abuse may involve, way example, sexual harassment, forcing inappropriately enticing someone take part sexual activities will, whether person aware happening. sexual abuse may involve physical contact, may also involve non-contact activities as, without limitation, grooming, exposing oneself, involving another person looking at, production of, sexual images, encouraging someone behave sexually inappropriate way.
